category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_MDS_Permitted_Actions_LOV
preference.preference_description: Specifies the List Of Values (LOV) holding permitted actions related to MDS (Material Data Sheet) in the International Material Data System (IMDS). A valid value is an LOV internal name.
